description: Retrieve information about the dedicated pool.

parameters.name: PoolName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated IP pool to retrieve.

nested_items.name: DedicatedIpPool
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about a dedicated IP pool.

nested_items.name: PoolName
nested_items.description: The name of the dedicated IP pool.

nested_items.name: ScalingMode
nested_items.description: The type of the dedicated IP pool.
STANDARD --- A dedicated IP pool where you can control which IPs are part of the pool.
MANAGED --- A dedicated IP pool where the reputation and number of IPs are automatically managed by Amazon SES.
